seoTitle: English Plumber | Plumbing & Heating in Medemblik
seoDescription: English Plumber is a friendly local plumber in Medemblik for expats and Dutch homeowners. Boiler servicing, radiator repair, tap repair, and general plumbing. WhatsApp +31 6 428 699 31.
heroSubheading: English Plumber helps expats and Dutch homeowners with reliable plumbing and heating in Medemblik and nearby towns.

autoPilotChips.label: Boiler Brands: Vaillant, Intergas, Remeha, ATAG

quickFixBody: Most companies patch the issue. We diagnose the cause and fix it properly with clear communication, fair pricing, and practical solutions.
noJargonBody: English Plumber is a friendly local service in Medemblik. We support expats and Dutch homeowners with clear advice, quality repairs, and reliable follow-up.

testimonialsList.name: Cathy F.
testimonialsList.quote: Quick response, clear communication in English, and the repair was done cleanly.

testimonialsList.name: Brenda M.
testimonialsList.quote: Friendly service and transparent pricing. My radiator issue was fixed quickly and everything was explained clearly.

testimonialsList.name: Mark L.
testimonialsList.quote: Boiler servicing was smooth and professional. Heating is stable again and communication over WhatsApp made everything easy.

testimonialsList.name: Angela D.
testimonialsList.quote: Great option for expats in North Holland. Easy to share photos on WhatsApp and book the right visit quickly.

commandCenterBody: Send photos and short videos on WhatsApp. English Plumber reviews the issue, shares a clear quote, and books your visit quickly.

howItWorksSteps.title: Send Photos on WhatsApp
howItWorksSteps.description: Share photos or a short video of the issue and your postcode.

howItWorksSteps.title: Problem Review
howItWorksSteps.description: We review the issue and recommend the best repair approach.

howItWorksSteps.title: Clear Quote & Plan
howItWorksSteps.description: You get transparent pricing: 95 EUR per hour labour and 145 EUR for boiler servicing.

howItWorksSteps.title: Repair & Follow-Up
howItWorksSteps.description: We complete the job cleanly and stay available for follow-up questions.

faqList.question: Where does English Plumber provide service?
faqList.answer: Primary service area includes Medemblik, Hoorn, Heerhugowaard, Purmerend, Alkmaar. Nearby towns within about 40km are also possible.

faqList.question: Do you work in Amsterdam or Almere?
faqList.answer: Not based in Amsterdam or Almere. If your location is nearby, send a WhatsApp message and we can confirm availability.

faqList.question: What services do you offer?
faqList.answer: Boiler servicing, radiator installation and repair, tap repair and replacement, and general plumbing handyman work. We do not offer drain services.

faqList.question: How does pricing work?
faqList.answer: 95 EUR per hour labour, 145 EUR for boiler servicing, and free quotes. WhatsApp photos and text for a fast first assessment.

faqCtaBody: Send a WhatsApp message and include photos of the problem.
aboutBody: English Plumber was built to give expats and Dutch homeowners a reliable plumber with clear communication, fair pricing, and quality workmanship.
finalCtaHeadingAccent: Send photos on WhatsApp and get a clear plan.
finalCtaBody: From boiler issues to leaking taps, we help you solve problems before they become expensive.
footerDescription: English Plumber provides plumbing and heating services in North Holland. Final scope and parts pricing are confirmed after assessment. Emergency 24/7 callouts are not offered.
